title: That moment when Kalista ults you . . .
body:
. . . and you were just about to use Nami W heal to save a team mate.

. . . and you were about to use Leona stun to stop that LeBlanc from dashing on your carry.

. . . and you were about to use Braum shield to stop Graves ult.

. . . and you were about to use Blitzcrank grab on their singled out carry.

. . . and you were about to use a Janna shield at max level to save your carry.

. . . and you were about to use Bard ult to delay that Baron fight for a steal.
